content: k1 m1p p1* repeat from * to * until the end 64 sts r12 *k3 p2 k1 p2* repeat from * to * until the end r13 repeat previous round r14 *k3 p2 m1r k1 m1l p2* repeat from * to * until the end 80 sts abbreviations cont r15 *k3 p2* repeat from * to * until the end r16 repeat previous round lli left lifted increase with the left r17 *k3 p2 k3 p1 m1l p1* repeat from * to * until the end 88 hand needle lift the left leg of the st sts 2 rounds below the last st on the right hand needle knit through that r18 *k3 p2 k3 p1 k1 p1* repeat from * to * until the end loop r19 *k3 p2 k3 p1 m1p k1 m1p p1* repeat from * to * until the end 104 sts m1p make 1 purl with the left hand needle lift the strand between r20 *k3 p2 k3 p2 k1 p2* repeat from * to * until the end the two sts entering from the back r21 repeat previous round being careful to form a loop make a r22 repeat previous round purl st r23 *k3 p2 k3 p2 m1r k1 m1l p2* repeat from * to * until the m1l make 1 left with the left hand end 120 sts needle lift the strand between the r24 *k3 p2* repeat from * to * until the end two sts entering from the front knit 1 st through the back loop continue knitting in rib k3-p2 until you reach the derided length m1r make 1 right with the left minus 1 5 cm hand needle lift the strand between the two sts entering from the back finishing knit 1 st once you have run out of yarn or reach the desired length cr-b cross sts back slip and hold at change to contrast colour if you don t want to use a second the back the 1st st from the left colour you will need to have at least 8 m for the following hand needle if you wish use a cable instructions knit 1 round in pattern with the new colour next needle pass the 2nd st to the right needle place the st on hold back on round rearrange the sts as follows *k1 p1 k1 p1 cr-b k1 p1 the left hand needle then place the k1 cr-f p1 k1 p1* repeat from * to * until the end of the round st on the right hand needle back on the left hand needle end with an italian bind-off there are many tutorials i like to do cr-f cross sts front make as cr-b but this bind off knitting 2 preparing rounds round 1 k1 slip 1 purl- hold the 1st st at the front wise with yarn in front repeating until the end round 2 slip 1 for the italian tubular bind off purl-wise with yarn at the back purl 1
